text: Apichet Petchmanee (born 24 October 1989) is a Thai professional boxer who has held the WBC-ABC lightweight title since 2019.https://boxrec.com/en/proboxer/853903 BoxRec ==Professional boxing record== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:95%" |- ! !Result !Record !Opponent !Type !Round, time !Date !Location !Notes |- |6 |Win |6–0 |style="text-align:left;"| Ari Agustian |UD |8 |21 Dec 2019 |style="text- align:left;"| | |- |5 |Win |5–0 |style="text-align:left;"| Chonlatarn Piriyapinyo |UD |10 |17 Aug 2019 |style="text-align:left;"| |style="text- align:left;"| |- |4 |Win |4–0 |style="text-align:left;"| Chonlatarn Piriyapinyo |UD |8 |22 Jun 2019 |style="text-align:left;"| | |- |3 |Win |3–0 |style="text-align:left;"| Shota Suito |UD |10 |23 Mar 2019 |style="text- align:left;"| |style="text-align:left;"| |- |2 |Win |2–0 |style="text- align:left;"| Sadudee Srimueang |TKO |2 (10), |22 Dec 2018 |style="text- align:left;"| |style="text-align:left;"| |- |1 |Win |1–0 |style="text- align:left;"| Attanon Kunlawong |TKO |2 (6), |20 Oct 2018 |style="text- align:left;"| | |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:Thai male boxers Category:Living people Category:1989 births Category:People from Surat Thani Province Category:Lightweight boxers
title: Apichet Petchmanee
